short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sina.com/Aliyun.com email extension for QuickMadeSim shop comunication

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Support both Sina.com and Aliyun.com email
Automatically extract QuickMadeSim order information from email box.
Highlight all order-emails, shipping-emails
Auto-focus on the first order or shipping email from email list
Extract shipping information from shipping-email mail body
